name: VWAP Triple-Inside Breakout
description: Intraday 30-minute technical-pattern strategy that trades liquid U.S. equities using VWAP band breakouts confirmed by a triple inside-bar consolidation and volume expansion. Long when price closes above the upper VWAP band after three consecutive inside bars with ≥1.5× 10-period average volume; short is symmetric on the lower band. Risk is capped at 0.75 % of equity per trade, stop set at 1.2 × ATR(14) and profit target at +2 %.
